TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit PropertyGroupDescription extends System.ComponentModel.GroupDescription

summary.span: 描述使用属性名作为条件对项进行分组。

span.span: Describes the grouping of items using a property name as the criteria.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 视图支持分组，这样用户就可以分区成逻辑组的集合视图中的集合的功能。Views support the functionality of grouping, which allows the user to partition the collection in the collection view into logical groups. 这些组可以是显式的，由用户提供组列表；也可以是隐式的，这些组依据数据动态生成。The groups can be explicit, where the user supplies a list of groups, or implicit, where the groups are generated dynamically depending on the data. 允许你创建基于的隐式组。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果你只想要按属性进行分组则可以设置属性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果你想要更改最终用于的组你可以使用的值属性提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，你可能需要对基于名称的第一个字母的组项。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果属性未设置，则项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 你还可以定义字符串比较应采取的位置使用属性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter Converter { get; set; }
.property instance class System.Windows.Data.IValueConverter Converter
Public Property Converter As IValueConverter
public: property System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ Converter { System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Data::IValueConverter ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置要应用于属性值或项以生成用于确定项所属组的最终值的转换器。

span.span: Gets or sets a converter to apply to the property value or the item to produce the final value that is used to determine which group(s) an item belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要更改最终用于的组你可以使用的值属性提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，你可能需要对基于名称的第一个字母的组项。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果属性未设置，则项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group.

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether the group name and the item name match so that the item belongs to the group.

summary.span: 获取或设置属性的名称，它用于确定项所属的组。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the property that is used to determine which group(s) an item belongs to.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 允许你创建基于的隐式组。 allows you to create implicit groups based on a . 如果你只想要按属性进行分组则可以设置属性。If you simply want to group by a property you can set the property. 如果你想要更改最终用于的组你可以使用的值属性提供值转换器。If you want to change the value that is eventually used for group you can use the property to supply a value converter. 例如，你可能需要对基于名称的第一个字母的组项。For example, you may want to group items based on the first letter of a name. 如果属性未设置，则项本身传递到值转换器。If the property is not set, the item itself is passed to the value converter. 转换器可能会返回一个集合，该集合指示项可以出现在多个组中。The converter may return a collection, which indicates the items can appear in more than one group. 你还可以定义字符串比较应采取的位置使用属性。You can also define how string comparison should take place using the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个 值，该值指定项的值（由 和 确定）和组名称之间的比较。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies the comparison between the value of an item (as determined by and ) and the name of a group.
The default value is ..

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除非在比较这两个值都是字符串，这将被忽略。This is ignored unless both values in the comparison are strings.
